0: It had plenty of room in both the living room and bedroom but had very drab furnishings virtually nothing on the walls a small cramped bathroom sink and a small closet located in the bathroom and was next to the elevators
The pool is large and there are two hot tubs
However when the front desk tells us that someone is coming upstairs with a key to our new room there was an issue with our first room I kind of expect that person to show up
Idid not change my room or cancel
Only 3 showers and a steam room that smells of mold
They put me in a room located above the spa thinking it will be quiet
The room should not have been used until the carpet could have stretched and tacked down
Then in the new room the fridge was not cold not even after making adjustments
1: The facilities are beautiful with stunning views
The room is spacious with very comfortable beds
The property really is beautiful and comfortable the views amazing but the people are all just so happy and friendly and helpful
The view of the area from the resort was amazing

I came to this location to relax for a night and stayed in the luxurious Signature Suite not only was I taken away by the beautiful vast landscape of the golf course from my 8th floor getaway but Tesia went over and beyond the call of duty for me with providing me with ear plugs because I could not sleep with noise next door
Everything is nice and I recommend getting a balcony with a view
Updated guestrooms and FB outlets are perfect for a quick get away
Beautiful grounds welcoming staff friendly and wonderful service clean big rooms ample storage space for clothes
